name: tools
schema: CREATE TABLE "tools" (`description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `documentation_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `featured_order` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `github` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `is_featured` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `license` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `logo` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `long_description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `organization` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `screenshot` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `screenshots` JSON DEFAULT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `status` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `technology` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `tool_type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `website` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, "demos" JSON DEFAULT NULL, "primary_capability" TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
